Cybernetic Mathematician

The Cybernetic Mathematician can plot complex trajectories through the solar system, allowing for fast travel and an accumlation of influence.

View details »

Interworld Diplomat

The Interworld Diplomat can negotiate treaties and agreements between opposing factions, gaining influence and acquiring resources for your cause.

Tiberius, Warp Captain

Tiberius can lead vast armadas of transports and capital ships, or pilot cutting edge attack vessels. Use Tiberius to overcome events and gain influence.
